title: A Look At Retail, Markets, And Supply Chain Struggles
itunes:title: A Look At Retail, Markets, And Supply Chain Struggles
description:
Anjee Solanki, National Director of Retail, US at Colliers, discusses the retail space and holiday shopping outlook. AJ Oden, Investment Strategist for BNY Mellon Investor Solutions, gives his investment outlook. Kristina Hooper, Chief Global Market Strategist at Invesco, talks markets. Mark Noble, Executive VP of ETF Strategy at Horizons ETFs, discusses the semi-conductor shortage and supply chain issues. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
